conclusion: In a v-t graph, the slope of the graph represents acceleration.
From 1 s to 2 s, the slope of the v-t curve becomes progressively steeper in the negative direction.

premise: From 1 s to 2 s, the slope of the v-t curve becomes progressively steeper in the negative direction.
conclusion: The (signed) acceleration becomes more negative; its magnitude is increasing, not decreasing.

premise: The (signed) acceleration becomes more negative; its magnitude is increasing, not decreasing.
conclusion: The statement 'gradually decreasing acceleration' is therefore incorrect.
